name: The Time Machine
description:
Are you brave enough to step into the time machine and venture forth into the unknown?

This is a stand-alone text adventure made in Twine (and featuring a little bit of pixel art) but you’ll enjoy it more if you have played the first Tiny Adventure, The Light At The Frankenstein Place.

The Time Machine features three endings for you to find – the good, the bad, and the indeterminate.

Credits:

  • Mandy J Watson (@mandyjwatson): Game design, narrative and writing, programming, and art
  • Fonts: Berkshire Swash by Brian J Bonislawsky DBA Astigmatic (AOETI) (Open Font Licence) and Alike Angular by Sveta Sebyakina, Alexei Vanyashin, and Cyreal (Open Font Licence)
